name: Fluvius System Operator
goal: Fluvius System Operator is a distribution system operator (DSO) in Belgium, with a market share in the Flemish region of 100% for electricity and gas respectively, based on number of access points (European Article Numbers - EANs). In the Flemish region Fluvius serves 300 municipalities. It's mandate comprises the regulated activities of electricity/gas distribution through the medium and low voltage/pressure grids, along with maintenance and repair of the distribution grid, collection and distribution of metering data, public lighting, and certain public service obligations. Fluvius also performs several other activities, such as district heating, sewer systems, telecommunications and energy and telecom services to local authorities.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks
